statements: SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary;
SELECT itinerary_id, flight_details FROM TravelItinerary;
SELECT itinerary_id, accommodation_bookings FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id > 3;
SELECT itinerary_id, sightseeing_plans FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT itinerary_id, flight_details FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 2;
SELECT accommodation_bookings FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 4 ORDER BY itinerary_id DESC;
SELECT itinerary_id, accommodation_bookings, sightseeing_plans FROM TravelItinerary WHERE itinerary_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM flight_details;
SELECT airline_name, departure_airport, destination_airport FROM flight_details;
SELECT flight_id, flight_date, airline_name, departure_airport, destination_airport FROM flight_details WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT * FROM accommodation_bookings;
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, hotel_name, city FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM flight_details WHERE airline_name='Air New Zealand' ORDER BY flight_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT flight_id, departure_airport, destination_airport FROM flight_details WHERE departure_airport='LAX' AND destination_airport='JFK';
SELECT airline_name, COUNT(*) as total_flights FROM flight_details GROUP BY airline_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_flights DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE city='Tokyo' ORDER BY check_in_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hotel_name, city, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM accommodation_bookings GROUP BY hotel_name, city ORDER BY total_bookings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM flight_details;
SELECT flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flight_details WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flight_details ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(flight_id) AS max_flight_id FROM flight_details;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM flight_details WHERE departure_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flight_details WHERE arrival_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flight_details WHERE arrival_airport = 'LAX' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, location_name, date, description FROM sightseeing_plans WHERE date = '2023-07-15';
SELECT booking_id, hotel_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, booking_status FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2023-09-01' AND '2023-09-30';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodations;
SELECT sightseeing_name, visit_date, cost FROM sightseeing;
SELECT * FROM travel_itinerary;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT flight_number, arrival_city, departure_date FROM flights WHERE arrival_city = 'Paris' AND departure_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT flight_id, departure_city, arrival_city, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'Los Angeles' AND arrival_city = 'London';
SELECT accommodation_name, location, check_in_date FROM accommodations WHERE location = 'Beach Resort' ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT sightseeing_name, location, visit_date, cost FROM sightseeing WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC, visit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM flight_details ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT airline, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flight_details WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT hotel_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE check_out_date >= '2022-10-15';
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM nomad_info WHERE nationality = 'Canadian';
SELECT * FROM flight_details ORDER BY flight_date DESC, airline ASC, departure_city, arrival_city
SELECT flight_id, flight_date, airline, departure_city FROM flight_details WHERE arrival_city = 'Paris'
SELECT * FROM accommodation_bookings WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sightseeing_plans WHERE location LIKE '%beach%' OR description LIKE '%sunset%'
SELECT nomad_id, full_name, nationality, phone_number FROM nomad_info ORDER BY nomad_id ASC
